website_summaries.verdict: A pricey 25-inch-class monitor, the Asus ROG Swift PG258Q's low resolution and limited port selection is outweighed by its outstanding gaming performance and the wealth of gamer-friendly features it offers, including an ultra-fast refresh rate and Nvidia's G-Sync technology.

customer_reviews.title: ASUS PG349Q Good monitor. Can’t see huge improvement over cheaper models.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned other ultra wide monitors and IPS glow seems to be always an issue. This monitor had a fairly balanced colour temperature on entire panel however IPS flow was present where I was hoping it would be eliminated (just assuming because of the price). I would have kept it but unit I have received had cosmetic fault at the back. Backlit ASUS logo was not fitted in properly/was slightly pushed in which I found unacceptable especially when paying this kind of money for monitor. Issues with returning the item to Amazon requires completely separate review to be written.
customer_reviews.author: @futureMichael

customer_reviews.title: If You Want an Ultrawide Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding monitor for gaming. It loses half a star for having a somewhat awkward stand to set up (odd since I have several other Asus monitors and they have the best stand fixtures around) and half because it seems impossible to get rid of a thin black bar at each end and along the top. If you look closely at images of it on the web you'll notice the bars. For practical purposes they don't matter at all - it's just slightly annoying if you like edge-to-edge monitors. But essentially it's a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny7

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Monitor Faulty!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in September of 2018. Since I bought it It has always had a weird screen glitch where occasionally a black line appears across the screen at random times. This really annoys me as I payed £500 for this monitor and I thought it would be good quality. The monitor has a good menu and you can customise a lot of the settings. It also has a very nice refresh rate of 240hz which is very nice for gaming. Overall I wouldn't buy this as it is very expensive and if its defective like mine it would be a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy one !
customer_reviews.text: bought for £985 on 28-10-2017 , ( lol at RRP: £2,921.24 ) amazing monitor quality is excellent, i'd recommend it to anyone, my panel was dated built august 2017. only two negative points . 1. all ips monitors suffer from it ( backlight glow ) , but its pretty minimal. 2. usb / cable input positions are fiddly ( should have made them rear exit.
customer_reviews.author: Hammy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price (TN)
customer_reviews.text: The blacks are washed out grey and the viewing angle is so low. guys my £100 benq has a better picture than this thing. avoid. all dark games just look muddy and poor quality. £550 is a joke of a price. I will try the ips version next and if no good i will refund and avoid Asus monitors.
customer_reviews.author: brtcobra

customer_reviews.title: Just Brilliant, would highly recommend for anyone who has the budget!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor as it had the specs I was looking for, and it is brilliant. There are loads of gimics such as an fps counter, crosshair and GPU stats plus more which I don't use, however, the number of variables you can control, lets you fine-tune your monitor to how you like it. I would recommend this monitor to anyone who loves gaming and has the budget for it. And the curved screen makes the experience, in my opinion, feel like you're more drawn in, especially in any game with First Person.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but an excellent monitor. G-SYNC makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Great image, no dead pixels, the 'film' on mine isn't noticable at all (some people have complained about this, no idea why), 144 frames per second on most standard graphics games and 60-80 frames per second on high graphics (using a GTX 970 card with this). The G-SYNC definitely makes a huge difference on some games for me, namely Watch Dogs 2, GTAV, Eve Online and the Metro Reduxes. All get much better frame rate and I can boost the graphics from medium/high to high/ultra on all of them now. Very happy. A bit expensive, really hurt to click that buy button, but it is a great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor ergonomics but terrible panel QC
customer_reviews.text: The product is one of the OG IPS 1440p panels and promises a lot. The g-sync module is great and the performance is good too. Games are smooth on it. HOWEVER.... the quality control is poor, mine had very poor backlight bleed, IPS glow and image retention was an issue as well. If the panel was properly QC’d it would be a different story.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 60Hz to this. The difference is massive. People are sceptical about the whole refresh rate thing, stating that the eye cannot detect it (my Dad being one of them). When I showed him this vs a 60Hz he couldn't believe it. I highly recommend this monitor. It came well packaged, with everything you need (even a HDMI and DP leads!). The only suggestion I give is that you probably need to turn the brightness down to about 25.
customer_reviews.author: L Finney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my teenage son for gaming and he loves it. Sharp graphics, fast response time and no lag on his games. My opinion is that it is very expensive, but these days you get what you pay for so I was overruled! We've had it for 18 months and it's still working perfectly with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Ruby

customer_reviews.title: does what is says
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine for me, same or better than a 27inch samsung monitor I was using. No dead pixels and arrived in 2 days with free shipping with Hermes. First thing I did was test 240hz with the "UFO Test: Multiple Framerates" website and it's the performance is the real deal. I chose this monitor because I'm on a 980ti, i7 4770 so 1080p will do fine for me whilst still having GSync. Maybe I could have chosen a cheaper one but w/e. Frame/stand build quality reflects price. I haven't tested the SRGB mode on games to see the difference but gSync works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randle D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with this monitor. I did a lot of research before buying and it was worth every penny. Extremely happy with the resolution, refresh rate and picture quality of this monitor. Would have been nice if it had a built in speaker but never mind. Make sure to use a display cable that can handle 1440p at 165hz. Beautiful design and red ring of light at the bottom really goes well with my other products. If i had the money I would buy 2 more of these and have 3 monitors together.
customer_reviews.author: Dantusari

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, its sleek and easy to adjust on the fly, i can happily switch from one game to the other. The only small note i would say is the preset gaming modes need to be trialled with your games to get the colours right, the presets are quite washed out if you've adjusted gamma etc fro a different monitor. Well worth buying and i will be investing in another one before too long to set up a dual screen setup with this monitor, plus it's got a 3 year warranty :)
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Backlight very noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this monitor, its sturdy, well made and very high picture quality. However, im having some issues with the backlight coming through, this may be the same for everyone however for an 850-pound monitor it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor i have used so far
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor i have used so far. Had a 4k 60hz monitor previous but the extra refresh rate makes so much more difference than what the 4k resolution adds. Will admit i do find the stand lighting up a bit gimmicky but luckily i use the Monitor on a Monitor Arm so this isnt a massive issue for me. G-Sync has helped massively on games where FPS can fluctuate massively such as CS GO to help prevent screen tearing which was a large issue on my previous screen. Some of the extra features such as Gameplus are a bit irrelevant for games but dont deter so nothing to moan about. Overall a Excellent Monitor and would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Lukesxs

customer_reviews.title: You really don't need ips for just gaming!
customer_reviews.text: After nearly getting sucked into the ips is so much better trend, I decided that as am only gaming I wouldn't need the ips and a tn panel would be just fine because I sit straight in front of my monitor. It arrived on time and well packaged. THE COLOURS ARE AMAZING.. really clear and the step up to 1440p is incredible from 1080p 60hz. All I found was I needed to turn the brightness down.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Brough

customer_reviews.title: There is something better than this
customer_reviews.text: The Acer Predator XB241H is so much better than this in terms of the colours even though both are TN panels. This Asus monitor has bad side angle views and the colours are so dull. Before buying this make sure you compare it wit the Acer Predator XB241H and you'll see that Acer is superior to Asus.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, both by performance and visually. The stand is sturdy and provides great cable management. Viewing angles could be better but it can be adjusted to the desired angle very well
customer_reviews.author: BaronDāvis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: Way too bright out of the box, but once it’s set up correctly (search the internet for recommended settings) it’s a really fine display. G sync makes a real difference and tearing is a thing of the past. Paired with a 1070, 1440p is largely flawless at high settings, and again g sync really helps if frame rates drop for a moment. Other premium touches such as a great stand, cable management, usb, FPS counter. Expensive, but superb.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I very nearly did not buy this simply because of so many shocking reviews on here. I am happy to say that I have not had any issues with this monitor and it works amazingly well through display port. Picture quality is pretty much perfect out the box and it’s great fun trying out all the different modes and overclocking it to 165Hz, not that you can really notice the difference! My advice would be to ignore the reviews and give it a go if you’re on the fence. If you do get a bad quality unit amazons return policy is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Osher

customer_reviews.title: Terrible backlight bleed
customer_reviews.text: Awful back light bleed in bottom left corner. Problem persisted at distance (5m) and at straight angle (i.e. not IPS glow). This monitor has a bad reputation for quality control. I took a chance and it did not pay off. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: was send a unit that had been sold and returned back to amazon
customer_reviews.text: not a typical review.. bought this monitor expecting it to be brand new unused. to find out that it had been sold and returned with issues once set up screen signal issues and turning itself off so being sent back again unacceptable behaviour for the price of this.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - buy something different.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this monitor, this one is only two years old. There are complaints all over ROGs forums about this issue with they are aware of. I’ve been denied warranty replacement RMA because I purchased from amazon UK to find out the supplier was German?!?! Clearly states on the website 3 year warranty with this monitor. Find a monitor with better customer service and better quality. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Simply not worth the high price tag. I'd more happily spend about £100 less for what you get. The screen is nice, but not the best I've seen. The colours are good, and the size and brightness is good. Also big shame it's not 4k.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Massive light bleed
customer_reviews.text: ASUS PG349Q box looked like it had already been opened when which came more apparent when I opened the box and some of the items had already been opened but I still went ahead and tried the monitor which had a lot of light bleed in bottom corners this monitor was a previous RMA. I've contacted Amazon for a return
customer_reviews.author: michael wright

customer_reviews.title: Gaming to the core
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor , because of reviews and the reputation of Asus being top quality . I have used Asus in the past and I have some of their items now . It is gaming to the core , the reason why I ordered it , it has already arrived , it was not due till next week . I would not hesitate to deal with the seller again .
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Ison

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor really happy with performance gysnc is unreal never used it before now couldn't be without it only thing is it's a tn panel which might annoy people who are use to ips but for me 165hz gsync makes up for it aswell as 1ms response time
customer_reviews.author: Slimbopayne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor, but bad service as i had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, but bad service as i had to return it twice before getting a good screen.First had dead pixels down the centre of the screen and the second had a very visible scratch on the screen. I was probably unlucky but If you are willing to put your luck on the table, go for it as it is a very good monitor and i do not regret buying and swapping it till it came Update edit: one small pixle on the screen has died. Tho Bairly visible unless it is on a black screen very disappointed. Also screen tear is a thing but turning the monitor off and on fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: Azan

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a 240hz monitor? This is a brilliant choice.
customer_reviews.text: Going from 60hz to 240hz monitor is was one of the best decision i made. The difference is night and day. This monitor was recommended to me by a friend and i am grateful he did! The one minor complaint is that the colours are not as vibrant as an ips panel (as it is a tn panel) and that it does not have hdr support however it makes up with how responsive and how smooth it is.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammed Mahmud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, even though pricey!
customer_reviews.text: The single best purchase I ever made. Very, very expensive, but after using it I can't go back. I do wish it was 144hz, but can't have everything and its' very immersive, well built looks good (in my opinion). I'd recommend ultrawide to anyone over anything else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming monitor I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, delivers exactly what promised. The only thing I dislike is that due to the rather short colour range, it doesn't make for good video/movie watching. Apart from that, response time is phenomenal, smoothness couldn't be better and the refresh rate makes all that happen. Sharp, crystal clear picture with every possible advantage. Obviously not a monitor to play Hearthstone on, more like games that require reactions. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Py8agoras

customer_reviews.title: It's very good if you know how TN panels look
customer_reviews.text: It does the gaming just fine for even very picky users. The only thing I had to get used to was the TN panel which was a major downgrade from an LCD. The colours look washed but after using it for solid few months I cannot recall how the LCD panel looked like.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I might get a dodgy one, Asus have let me down in the past, But did rectify my problem then. This time it's perfect out the box. Haven't managed to get it to run on 165Hz yet, but 144Hz is enough for me. I have a 2080 Ti graphics card and 9900 intel processor. A great 2K monitor with this set up. Especially for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cg Tombling

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Really love the bigger resolution, G-Sync, high refresh rate. Everything about it is awesome. I have had friends with the same product who have had to RMA 3 times because they had backlight bleed or dead pixels. I didn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Summit

customer_reviews.title: High quality & (in my experience) reliable
customer_reviews.text: Has been in regular use (4-6 hours a day every day) for 18 months now and I'm entirely pleased with it. No dead pixels, no faults. Blacks are good for a TN panel. UI for display settings is a little clunky but you really only need to use it once. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P Jones

customer_reviews.title: great screen for gaming and work
customer_reviews.text: amazing screen. tried using a 40" 4k led tv for gaming first which was ok but laggy and not fast enough refresh or contrast changing. text was also an issue when working. moved to this and no complaints super fast and crisp and colours look great also. well made too with a solid metal stand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Superb monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, worth every penny Games look absolutely amazing on this monitor. The colors are superb the g sync feature makes a noticeable difference when playing games on high, especially when your graphics card isn't quite good enough. I have a Nvidia GTX 980, which struggles on some games when the graphics options are maxed out. I would strongly advice having a Nvidia GTX 980TI or better for this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor plug
customer_reviews.text: Amazon, sort your description out. The product failed to mention that the plug for the monitor was not a UK plug and I was unable to use the monitor as a whole despite spending basically £700 on it. The product itself after finally getting it sorted is absolutely fantastic and worth the money, but not the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Chlopecki-Carslake

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Despite all of the bad reviews this monitor gets with regards to bad quality control I decided to jump on this monitor due to being on sale. I must have won the lottery for once because my monitor doesn't have any bleed or dead pixels. Brightness Is questionable out of the box but a quick calibration brings this monitor to unbelievable levels, I have never owned a 1440p monitor before and this has blown me away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Not had a single problem which has made my day considering AOC and their 34 inch ultrawide cant seem to get one without capacitors popping or dead pixels, this is amazing and i game on it all the time, big increase in gaming performance.
customer_reviews.author: Stevi-Lei

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: terrible black light bleed, wouldn't overclock past 75hz, Just a very bad monitor, guess i got unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but again with ASUS a lottery
customer_reviews.text: Monitor looks amazing until games with darker areas, my monitor had really bad bleed in the top left corner I couldn't help but notice it. It's a shame that in this day and age you can spend nearly £1000 and still have a huge chance to have a dodgy panel - who wants to spend that sort of money for it not to be perfect?
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: I must say this monitor is absolutely amazing! I switched over from 1080 IPS Asus to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to know about this monitor and the difference between IPS and TN models is readily available through numerous and in-depth reviews quick internet search away. However, I must say this monitor is absolutely amazing! I switched over from 1080 IPS Asus to this and the clarity, functions, speed, feel and build on this are all superior. Viewing angles, colours (after calibration), G-Sync and the rest this has to offer are all way better then I expected. I love it and highly recommend if you have the cash for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Hlousek

customer_reviews.title: The Good choice. I have 3 of them.
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor. I ordered two of them and one was not working from the start. I asked a refund and make new order. Now its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Arabba

customer_reviews.title: Good but some fault
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen. But there is some bleeding around the edge. For the price of the screen that should not be there. Screen is amazing with the field of view. Gives a good advantage and the quality is other wise amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sara G.

customer_reviews.title: Really good item, works incredibly well after some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Item works really well, it's a bit too bright for my taste so manual adjustment was needed, but after the adjustments it-s more than perfect
customer_reviews.author: sanjin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product when comes to flexibility(tilt,turn, lift) about the screen not so great, faded colours also came out of the box with a stuck pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: marked as "minor cosmetical damage on the sides" but item is not even working. shows only a white screen and can't even access the menu. horrible experience
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Productivity and Gaming! Well done Asus
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and the IPS screen is superb, clocked at 100FPS, no issues at all connected to my Nvidia GTX 1080, constant frame rate, no glow and minimal light bleed for an IPS screen. Working with a UW34Inch screen with a high refresh rate is a joy far more productive for me that using 2 screens.
customer_reviews.author: JustinL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of research into getting a new monitor. It's absolutely fantastic. The colours are, i'd say, 99% perfect out of the box, and only needed a little tweaking, but really, that didn't even need to be done. The colours and great for a TN panel and it's easy as hell to OC for 165hz. G-Sync is fantastic and im going to be super happy with this baby for years to come (hopefully)!
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: I would skip it
customer_reviews.text: Meah. Good monitor. dont get me wrong it is a thing of beauty. BUT it is not worth the money and the bleed light is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aweful monitor & aweful Amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible.picture.quality. Edit: It's now 7 days later and still no refund on my Amazon account. Don't bother with this trash.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels
customer_reviews.text: Got the monitor, all was good until i realised just below my crosshair were 2-3 dead pixels permanently stuck on green. And now amazon is out of stock ¬_¬
customer_reviews.author: Ewen

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: I recived package very fast, monitor is beautiful: But I can’t use it becouse energy supply cable cant be connected to adapter... I can’t use it... What a shame for this money... if You don’t have product suitable for UK market don’t sell it here!!
customer_reviews.author: Michal Kedziora

customer_reviews.title: Good product, it's been fantastic in fact. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it's been fantastic in fact. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: I had a bright pixel appear after 1 month, Now a year on the replacement they sent me now has bright pixels...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference over 2560x1440 10-bit VA 60hz I was using before
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few reviews about TN panels and colour issues I was pleasantly surprised at how decent the colours are even compared to a benQ 32 inch 2560x1440 10-bit VA panel I have. I have a intel i7 3770k gtx 1080 and so far most games I'm seeing around 185fps - I suspect the CPU might be causing a slight bottleneck due to its age but even so its such an improvement over the 60hz I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Great step-up after mundane monitor, color-banding.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, colour-banding is an issue. I am using it in constant RGB-mode, sometimes there is flickering, and I see micro-stutter while watching some YouTube-videos, although I'm not sure the latter has anything to do with the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: dONALD

customer_reviews.text: Was broken during delivery I think.. It did not affect on the quality. I am upset.. Good for the gaming and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona Chajerova

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming monitor for high refresh rates
customer_reviews.text: Went from a 4K 60Hz monitor to this 1440p 165Hz monitor with absolutely no regrets. I haven’t noticed any backlight bleed or dead pixels like some other reviews suggest. It may be a game of luck to whether you get a working product or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mike varley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing screen - for those who don't mind screen bleed - on the edges - but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Propowspe

customer_reviews.title: jaw dropping visual and performance!
customer_reviews.text: never bought a monitor this expensive. But upon booting it up, the image quality is totally deserving of the price tag and the build quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: byangc

customer_reviews.title: 144Hz all the way!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this monitor to bits. It works so well and has improved my overall gaming experience. If you play FPS games, this monitor is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Became my main monitor. Got this to go with my ROG Dominator. Looks amazing, no problems, Configuration is easy.
customer_reviews.author: SystemAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: A great gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: jumped from 60 to 240hz, the difference it's huge, but bear in mind that you need a BF PC to be able to supply this monitor with all those juicy frames, but even if you dont use the top of the line graphics card, as long as you have an NVIDIA GPU that supports G-Sync, you will be stutter free, that's the main reason i bought this thing. A great gaming monitor overall
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: What a amazing monitor been playing games for a good few hours ...
customer_reviews.text: What a amazing monitor been playing games for a good few hours and can definitely notice how much smoother the games look. If you’re thinking of buying this stop and just buy it you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: RustyJohn

customer_reviews.title: Stil not found a fault.
customer_reviews.text: Quality picture and a blistering 144hz (165 overclocked) 2k display worthy of any dedicated gaming setup.
customer_reviews.author: Delmonti

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Product broke in a few months of buying it just no power to the monitor replaced the power cable and still does not work. No returns for it either even after just a few months do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a used monitor
customer_reviews.text: The box was clearly opened and I was sent a used product, when paying a premium you expect to get a new product.
customer_reviews.author: mihai calenciuc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Quite pricey but a great monitor for gaming. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. K. Partridge

customer_reviews.title: jurka
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor got used very good and looks like new and pay only 340 thanks amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Jurka

customer_reviews.title: its worth the money
customer_reviews.text: it has g sync , free sync , aura light , what alse you need?
customer_reviews.author: Rob3rt

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for gsynch issues
customer_reviews.text: Good gaming monitor a little pricey tbh as there is little driver support, gsynch at 165hz can cause a center line down the screen. But can be solved with turning off and on again. A common gsynch issue I’m told. Still great screen to have at home or work
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: just dont do it
customer_reviews.text: 800 pound for this sent it straight back as the light bleed , ips glow , and screen flicker is so bad. still waiting for my refund a week later ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: So this was a gift for my partner. he absolutely loves it. was packaged nicely and luckily wasn't too heavy to carry. very sleek looking highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Orintatata

customer_reviews.title: Move Over peasants
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last Christmas, still haven't seen anything anywhere near as good as this. Maybe would not buy this now, as the new one should be on Amazon very soon, and if you're gonna spend that kinda money you want the latest.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor money can buy. Omen x35 can suck it. This is the king! ~ minor BLB but it's an IPS panel, not much to do about that.
customer_reviews.author: Outplay

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on Time - Perfect Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Arrived whithin a week of placing the order. Perfect monitor, absolutley beautiful screen. No set up or quality issues whatsoever. I thoroughly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Orson Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest monitor but you get what you pay for ultimately. Absolute treat to use day-to-day. Couldn't go back to a non G sync monitor Speakers are slightly on the weak side but useful to have them as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Martin B

customer_reviews.title: Really nice monitor. Only 4 stars as this screen has ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor. Only 4 stars as this screen has a lot of back light bleed. For the price you should not get this amount of bleed.
customer_reviews.author: stc1980

customer_reviews.title: great monitor but not when there is flys
customer_reviews.text: had monitor awhile its great but recently some little flys have crawled behind the screen and now have a red dot and some black little dots around on it :(
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: DUD, broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: joystick at back broken off, couldnt use, looks like amzon which said it was A1 didnt check the monitor at all
customer_reviews.author: steve ryan

customer_reviews.title: Overwatch Rank ups included *
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I have ever used. 165Hz in Overwatch is a must!
customer_reviews.author: CGJoe

customer_reviews.title: Fast ‘n’ smooth!
customer_reviews.text: 165hz, buttery smooth in games (paired with RTX 2080). For general use IPS looks ‘nicer’ than the TN panel but a minor quibble. An excellent screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor for gaming I would recommend it but if you can afford the IPS version PG279Q it’s much better picture quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent gaming monitor. It's not for content creation as the colours aren't to that standard, neither will the resolution be for that specific purpose. But for gaming, this monitor has a very high refresh rate and a very fast response time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H.

customer_reviews.title: yeeeeeeeeees!
customer_reviews.text: i love it ,i refund it because i do not use prime the frist time. so i buy it again at other account have prime.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: awesome, very happy with my purchase. I did however miss the step on the CoD Black ops 4 so if someone could help me wout with it it would be much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: JonnyBooth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen, it makes such a difference playing on this 165hz screen a must have for a good card.
customer_reviews.author: Siris1984

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels :(
customer_reviews.text: Had 3 dead pixels and a spec of dust/dirt? Under the screen. IPS glow present but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Quality Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture, TN panel no edge bleed. Easy control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Downton

customer_reviews.title: Its getting on a bit now
customer_reviews.text: It works brilliantly - but its a lot of money for last-gen tech
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor. Some accessories were missing.
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor. I gave it a 4 star rating because it didn't come with all the cables that were supposed to come in the package. (EU power cord and Hdmi cable).
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor i've ever used, if your a CS GO player and want zero stutter make sure you go 4:3 1920 x 1440 display (its a default option, looks really beautiful) I have g-sync OFF at all times for all games, if you got a nice rig you don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is so bad
customer_reviews.text: Imagine quality is so bad but that is what you get with a TFT Panel. In games the picture quality is ok but its awful for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor, I got it second hand from here it's decent
customer_reviews.author: Tay Brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. i am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mafialad

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Using on an xbox one x but is the best I've used
customer_reviews.author: Phate

customer_reviews.title: Wife got me this for Christmas and I was blown ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife got me this for Christmas and I was blown away going to 144Hz with G-Sync from a basic 60Hz monitor w/o adaptive-sync. Speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 Dead Pixels 6 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Was a decent monitor to be honest, but after 6 months of use 2 dead pixels just appeared out of nowhere. As such I’ve had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Guts

product_meta.title: ASUS ROG SWIFT PG258Q, 25 Inch (24.5 Inch) FHD (1920 x 1080) eSport Gaming Monitor, 1 ms, Up to 240 Hz, DP, HDMI, USB 3.0, G-SYNC
product_meta.description:
Style Name:240 Hz| Size Name:25 InchASUS ROG SWIFT PG258Q 25-inch (24.5-inch) eSport Gaming Monitor, FHD (1920 x 1080), 1 ms, Upto 240 Hz, DP, HDMI, USB3.0, G-Sync. UK Power Supply.

BOX CONTAINS
ROG SWIFT PG258Q Monitor
Power cord
Power adapter
DisplayPort cable
USB 3.0 cable
Quick start guide
HDMI cable
Support CD
Warranty Card
feature_bullets: 24.5-inch full HD gaming monitor with a 240 Hz native refresh rate for fluid gameplays,3 Pin Plug is present at the bottom of the box.
Ultra-fast 1 ms response time and G-SYNC technology to eliminate motion blur and tearing for super-smooth gameplay
Frameless design with customisable built-in lighting effects to create your own light projections. Height adjustment : 0~120 mm
Voltage: 100-240V, 50/60Hz. ASUS GamePlus hotkey for in-game enhancements while GameVisual for optimised visuals
VESA wall-mountable to save on desktop space plus ergonomically-designed stands with full tilt, swivel, pivot and height adjustment
